versions.0.3: Fetch latest bilibili posts and post to Discord channels.
versions.0.4: Changed Discord message format from texts to embeds.
versions.0.5: Added response method to show bot description.
versions.0.6: Mute the first post when the bot is restarted.
versions.0.7: Modified config in order to send post to multiple channels.
versions.0.9: Adjusted the condition to return 'about' info.
versions.0.10: Fixed parsing issue of bilibili content type: DYNAMIC_TYPE_ARTICLE.
versions.0.11: Added alert function to notice modifyer to refresh cookies.
versions.0.12: Modified about function to parse information of the latest version.
versions.1.1: Fixed problem that this.rawPost() would be executed multiple times.
versions.1.2: Fixed parsing issue of bilibili content type: DYNAMIC_TYPE_LIVE_RCMD.
versions.1.3: Reference sheet is added; Prefix is set to '!cr'.
versions.1.4: Improved the format of the reference sheet.
versions.1.5: Updated the allowed format of input of references; Properties are allowed to be deleted.
versions.1.6: Installed PRTS for communication between prototypes.
versions.1.10: Content parsing for post type forward is available.
versions.1.12: Croissant.sendPostWithDynamicId() can be called with discord messages.
versions.1.14: Data parsing of dynamic type article is changed.
versions.1.17: Content type 中奖通知 are ignored.
versions.1.21: Croissant's alarm for package updates is added.
versions.1.22: To prevent unexpected request errors while fetching package links, try operator is introduced.
versions.1.23: Selection logic of post type is improved.
